answers.text: It is important to separate the sections in the code to easily identify the functions, conditionals, or statements.
It is useful to be inspired by a movie or series while writing.
It is better to write short and punctual codes
It is good to use long and compound names for variables

initMessages: In code programming, the way we write is very important.
It depends on this that the machine can perfectly understand and execute the orders.
Select good programming practices from the following list.
name: Good practices
